objectNumberTooltip: The number of objects displayed here includes the total number of objects, their versions, and objects with a deletion marker
disableEncryptionDesc1: The data stored in your bucket is currently not encrypted.
disableEncryptionDesc2: Benefit from a simplified encryption solution with SSE-OMK.
enableEncryptionDesc1: Encryption is automatically applied to new objects stored in the bucket.
encryptionTooltip: This type of encryption simplifies the process by using keys managed by OVHcloud. This method is ideal for customers who want a robust encryption solution without the complexities of key management.
activateEncryptionDescription: Enables server-side encryption with keys managed by OVHcloud to secure your data at rest.
activateEncryptionWarning: Once enabled, encryption will only apply to new uploaded objects and cannot be disabled.
disableVersionning: Protect your data now. Enable versioning to easily restore your objects in case of accidental deletion or modification.
enableVersionning: Your objects are versioned to ensure better traceability and recovery in case of loss or modification.
activateVersionningDescription: Automates the creation of versions of an object to prevent accidental deletion, or simply when a new object is uploaded.
